sentences.en: A properly managed stand will remain reasonably productive for two years.
sentences.cn: 管理适当的草场能保持旺盛生长两年.

sentences.en: But man has made it productive with its tools, with its technology.
sentences.cn: 但人们已经用他们的工具和技术使其变得很肥沃.

sentences.en: I was sorry he had left, although I soon developed a productive relationship with his successors.
sentences.cn: 虽然我很快就和他的继任者建立了良好的关系，但是我仍然对他的离开感到遗憾。

sentences.en: If the tiller is industrious, the farmland is productive.
In practice, however, such an attitude is counter-productive.
sentences.cn: 然而，实际上这种态度只会适得其反。

sentences.en: It is counter-productive to address an interviewee in patronizing tones.
sentences.cn: 以盛气凌人的语气同面试者讲话将会适得其反。

sentences.en: Land, labor and capital are all productive of wealth.
sentences.cn: 土地、劳动和资本都能创造财富。

sentences.en: More productive farmers have been able to provide cheaper food.
sentences.cn: 农民提高产量就能使食物更加便宜。

sentences.en: Most of us are more productive in the morning.
sentences.cn: 我们大多数人在早上更有效率。

sentences.en: Our discussions were amicable and productive.
sentences.cn: 我们的讨论气氛非常友好并且富有成果。

sentences.en: Relations of production must conform to the level of productive forces.
sentences.cn: 生产关系必须适合生产力.

sentences.en: Science and technology are part of the productive forces.
The changes were not productive of better labour relations.
sentences.cn: 这些改变并未能使劳资关系获得改善.

sentences.en: The village cadre said they did not do productive work , they just fooled around.
sentences.cn: 村干部说他们不好好生产, 吊儿郎当.
培训提高了工人们的生产力。

words.tran_cn: 制作人，制片人；生产者；发生器
产品；结果；[数] 乘积；作品
赢利性；生产率，生产能力；多产性
生产力；生产率；生产能力

trans.tran_cn: 富有成效的，多产的，生产性的，具有创造性的
